a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Decadal average: Death rates from natural disasters, World
Death rates are measured as the number of deaths per 100,000 people.
Data source: EM-DAT, CRED / Université catholique de Louvain, Brussels (Belgium)
